Package org.apache.axis2.clustering.tribes

Interface Summary
OperationMode The mode in which this member is operating such a loadBalance or application
 

Class Summary
ApplicationMode Represents a member running in application mode
AtMostOnceInterceptor Message intereceptor for handling at-most-once message processing semantics
Axis2ChannelListener This is the Tribes channel listener which is used for listening on the channels, receiving messages & accepting messages.
Axis2Coordinator The non-blocking coordinator interceptor
ChannelSender  
ClusterManagementInterceptor This interceptor is used when this member acts as a ClusterManager.
ClusterManagementMode Represents a member running in load balance mode
MembershipManager Responsible for managing the membership.
MulticastBasedMembershipScheme Implementation of the multicast based membership scheme.
RpcInitializationRequestHandler Handles RPC initialization requests from members
TribesClusteringAgent The main ClusteringAgent class for the Tribes based clustering implementation
TribesConstants This class holds the configuration parameters which are specific to Tribes
TribesMembershipListener Membership changes are notified using this class
TribesUtil  
WkaBasedMembershipScheme Implementation of the WKA(well-known address) based membership scheme.
WkaMembershipService This is the MembershipService which manages group membership based on a Well-Known Addressing (WKA) scheme.
